name: Lost Dutchman's Gold & Spider Mountain Adventures
overview: This is a compilation release of the "Rider Fantasy Creations" series. Lost Dutchman's Gold - is a text based adventure game. Your goal in the game is to find the legendary lost Dutchman's gold. You begin the game in a miner's shack; searching about, you find a map which seems to indicate where the lost gold is located. Now you'll set out on a dangerous quest through deserts, mountains, and even ghost towns in order to locate the mine where the gold is buried. The ghost of Back-Pack Sam (better known as the computer) will guide you on your quest by providing descriptions and clues. You get around and interact with the game by entering two word commands. Good luck! Spider Mountain Adventure - you are a knight stationed at the base of Spider Mountain, and your goal is gather the four treasures hidden beneath the tavern of an abandoned village. As the player explores the surface, they can encounter orcs, but they leave the player alone if unprovoked. The player must discover how to explore beneath the tavern, and there must locate a gold ring, mithril arming doublets, a sack of gold ducats, and a jewel. Upon locating these four items, they player must return them to the tavern, receiving their final score if all items are dropped.
